pr_title: OAuth Scim Service: Fixed Issue #844 - change the status to ACTIVE from change password api

timeline.message:
Fixed Issue #844

User account status is set to PASSWORD_RESET(3) when user requests reset password via forgot password action. User account status should be set to ACTIVE(0) when user changes his/her password.

timeline.bodyText: should password_reset be remove from use status? it doesn't sound like an status to me, should be a flag instead.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: After login success, am sending the user status to mobile apps or participant manager, based on status they show change password or landing page. I'm setting status to PASSORD_RESET when password changed using forgot password. I agree we could have added a column for flag but I used status for this from the beginning. Thanks for approving the PR.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc
